ps3.3:2.1_0: Hañci cittena abhisameti, tena hi aññāṇī abhisameti?
ps3.3:3.1_1: tena hi acittena ca ñāṇena ca acittako abhisameti?
ps3.3:4.1_0: Hañci cittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti,
ps3.3:4.1_1: tena hi kāmāvacaracittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti?
ps3.3:4.2_0: Na kāmāvacaracittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti.
ps3.3:5.1_0: Tena hi rūpāvacaracittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti?
ps3.3:5.2_0: Na rūpāvacaracittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti.
ps3.3:6.1_0: Tena hi arūpāvacaracittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti?
ps3.3:6.2_0: Na arūpāvacaracittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti.
ps3.3:7.1_0: Tena hi kammassakatacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti?
ps3.3:7.2_0: Na kammassakatacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti.
ps3.3:8.1_0: Tena hi saccānulomikacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti?
ps3.3:8.2_0: Na saccānulomikacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti.
ps3.3:9.1_0: Tena hi atītacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti?
ps3.3:9.2_0: Na atītacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti.
ps3.3:10.1_0: Tena hi anāgatacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti?
ps3.3:10.2_0: Na anāgatacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti.
ps3.3:11.1_0: Tena hi paccuppannalokiyacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti?
ps3.3:11.2_0: Na paccuppannalokiyacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti.
ps3.3:11.3_0: Lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe paccuppannacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti.
ps3.3:12.1_0: Kathaṁ lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe paccuppannacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti?
ps3.3:12.2_0: Lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe uppādādhipateyyaṁ cittaṁ ñāṇassa hetu paccayo ca taṁsampayuttaṁ nirodhagocaraṁ dassanādhipateyyaṁ ñāṇaṁ cittassa hetu paccayo ca taṁsampayuttaṁ ñāṇaṁ nirodhagocaraṁ.
ps3.3:12.3_0: Evaṁ lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe paccuppannacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti.
ps3.3:17.1_0: Yvāyaṁ kilese pajahati, atīte kilese pajahati …pe…
ps3.3:17.2_0: anāgate kilese pajahati, paccuppanne kilese pajahati, atīte kilese pajahatīti.
ps3.3:17.3_0: Hañci atīte kilese pajahati, tena hi khīṇaṁ khepeti, niruddhaṁ nirodheti, vigataṁ vigameti, atthaṅgataṁ atthaṅgameti,
ps3.3:17.3_1: atītaṁ yaṁ na atthi taṁ pajahatīti?
ps3.3:17.6_0: Hañci anāgate kilese pajahati, tena hi ajātaṁ pajahati, anibbattaṁ pajahati, anuppannaṁ pajahati, apātubhūtaṁ pajahati,
ps3.3:17.6_1: anāgataṁ yaṁ na atthi taṁ pajahatīti?
ps3.3:17.9_1: tena hi ratto rāgaṁ pajahati, duṭṭho dosaṁ pajahati, mūḷho mohaṁ pajahati, vinibaddho mānaṁ pajahati, parāmaṭṭho diṭṭhiṁ pajahati,
ps3.3:17.9_3: aniṭṭhaṅgato vicikicchaṁ pajahati, thāmagato anusayaṁ pajahati,
ps3.3:18.1_0: Na hi atīte kilese pajahati, na anāgate kilese pajahati,
ps3.3:18.2_0: Hañci na atīte kilese pajahati, na anāgate …pe…
ps3.3:18.3_0: na paccuppanne kilese pajahati, tena hi natthi maggabhāvanā, natthi phalasacchikiriyā, natthi kilesappahānaṁ, natthi dhammābhisamayoti?
ps3.3:18.4_0: Atthi maggabhāvanā, atthi phalasacchikiriyā, atthi kilesappahānaṁ, atthi dhammābhisamayo.
ps3.3:18.8_0: Ye tassa rukkhassa ajātaphalā, te ajātāyeva na jāyanti,
ps3.3:18.8_1: anibbattāyeva na nibbattanti, anuppannāyeva na uppajjanti,
ps3.3:18.10_0: Uppāde ādīnavaṁ disvā anuppāde cittaṁ pakkhandati.
ps3.3:18.11_0: Anuppāde cittassa pakkhandattā ye uppādapaccayā kilesā nibbatteyyuṁ, te ajātāyeva na jāyanti,
ps3.3:18.11_1: anibbattāyeva na nibbattanti, anuppannāyeva na uppajjanti,
ps3.3:18.13_0: Pavattaṁ hetu, nimittaṁ hetu, āyūhanā hetu.
ps3.3:18.15_0: Āyūhane ādīnavaṁ disvā anāyūhane cittaṁ pakkhandati.
ps3.3:18.16_1: ye āyūhanapaccayā kilesā nibbatteyyuṁ, te ajātāyeva na jāyanti,
ps3.3:18.16_2: anibbattāyeva na nibbattanti, anuppannāyeva na uppajjanti,
ps3.3:18.18_0: Evaṁ atthi maggabhāvanā, atthi phalasacchikiriyā, atthi kilesappahānaṁ, atthi dhammābhisamayoti.
